title: Azure Core Governance Infrastructure as Code
description: This project implements Azure governance patterns at enterprise scale, providing a foundation for Azure landing zones with comprehensive governance controls including management groups, policies, role assignments, and security baselines.

title: Azure Cost Optimizer
description: A tool that identifies cost optimization opportunities in Azure subscriptions through automated analysis of resource usage patterns, idle resources, and right-sizing recommendations, helping organizations reduce cloud spend.

title: Azure IaC Module Library
description: A comprehensive library of reusable Terraform modules for Azure cloud resources. These modules follow best practices for security, scalability, and maintainability, enabling consistent and reliable infrastructure deployments across different environments.

title: Multi-Environment CI/CD Pipeline
description: A robust CI/CD pipeline implementation for deploying applications to multiple environments (Dev, Test, UAT, Prod) with appropriate controls, approvals, and validation at each stage. Ensures consistent and reliable software delivery.

title: Kubernetes Monitoring Suite
description: A comprehensive monitoring solution for Kubernetes clusters that integrates various open-source tools to provide metrics, logging, and alerting capabilities with custom dashboards for different stakeholders.

title: DR Automation Framework
description: An automated disaster recovery framework that orchestrates the recovery process for critical applications according to predefined SLAs, ensuring business continuity during outages with minimal manual intervention.

title: Security Compliance Scanner
description: A tool that evaluates Azure resources against industry best practices and compliance standards. It provides comprehensive reports on security posture and actionable recommendations for remediating vulnerabilities.

title: Portfolio Website
description: Personal portfolio website showcasing projects, certifications, and contact information, built with Jekyll and Tailwind CSS.
